name: Ggj2018RobotLoveSong
description:
A corrupted code has started a robot rebellion. Serenade your electronic rivals with a transmission. In this game, you will need sound.

Instructions:
1. Your hero automatically moves towards the next enemy.
2. When at the next enemy you'll hear a rhythm
3. Reproduce the rhythm you hear using the spacebar. If you're successful you'll move onto the next enemy (there are 5).
4. If you run out of battery, the green bar on the bottom, you'll have to start over from the beginning.

More details at https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/robot-love-song
Harder asteroids version at https://milizhang.itch.io/robotlovesong-meteor
Lordmasta's version https://lordmasta.itch.io/robot-love-song-v2

.
